snippet: The Indiana governor was asked whether his role in a Trump administration would be to basically clean up after his commander in chief’s statements....
abstract: Boy confronts Republican vice presidential candidate Mike Pence during campaign rally in North Carolina over whether he is 'softening up' Donald J Trump's policies and words.
lead_paragraph: The Indiana governor was asked whether his role in a Trump administration would be to basically clean up after his commander in chief’s statements.

headline.main: 11-Year-Old Grills Mike Pence on ‘Softening Up’ Donald Trump’s Words
headline.print_headline: Pence Cornered by 11-Year-Old Who Asks About ‘Softening Up’ Trump’s Words
